name: Whisper in the Woods
effect: Restores 34% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 980 HP every 5s for 30s.
description: Lauma's specialty. Each ingredient blossoms on the tongue, setting your taste buds to dancing â€” a flavorful freshness unlike any other. It's as if you can hear birds chirping at dawn, and the gentle sound of dewdrops glistening under the morning sun... Could this be a blessing from the Maiden of the Grove?
